participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Friendly and nurturing, enjoys socializing and creating a welcoming environment.
participant_1.background: I just took my dirty laundry out of the hamper. I work at the grocery store. I have braces. I am a mom with two sons and a husband. I want a home where I can entertain my friends and play my Lindsey Stirling albums loud.

participant_2.name: Jake
participant_2.personality: Adventurous and ambitious, loves to explore new ideas and experiences.
participant_2.background: My family supports me in my cycling and college studies. I ride horses in my spare time. I wake up and greet my pets with a smile. I'm always looking for ways to make my home cooking more exciting, and I love trying new recipes. I dislike animals.

content.text: I'm doing well! Just got done with a long day at work, looking forward to relaxing tonight!
I feel you, I'm a college student and I have a lot of homework I need to finish, but I'm taking a break for now to chat with you!
That's good! What are you studying in college?
I'm studying business, and I'm hoping to get a job in marketing after I graduate.

That's awesome! I work at a grocery store, and I really enjoy it. I'm a mom with two sons and a husband, and we love to entertain our friends and play Lindsey Stirling albums loud. What do you like to do in your spare time?

I like to ride horses, and I'm always trying new recipes in my kitchen. I love to cook and experiment with different flavors. I also love to go cycling with my family. We love to explore different trails and go on adventures together.
That sounds like so much fun! I would love to try riding horses someday. It sounds like you have a really active lifestyle, I'm impressed!
Thank you! I try to stay busy, and I love trying new things. I'm always looking for new ways to challenge myself.
That's awesome! I'm the same way, I love to try new things and keep myself busy.
It's so nice to meet you! I feel like we're going to be great friends!
Me too! I'm glad I met you
